hints.title: Entropy Dissipation Under Cloning (Mean-Field Sketch)
hints.content:
2315: :label: lem-mean-field-cloning-sketch
2316: 
2317: **Hypotheses:**
2318: 
2319: 1. $\mu, \pi$ are probability measures on $\Omega = X_{\text{valid}} \times V_{\text{alg}} \subset \mathbb{R}^{2d}$ with smooth densities:
2320:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi \in C^2(\Omega)$
2321:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi > 0$ on $\Omega$ (strictly positive)
2322: 
2323: 2. $\pi = \pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave (Axiom 3.5):
2324:    $$\rho_\pi(z) = \exp(-V_{\text{QSD}}(z))$$
2325:    for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
2326: 
2327: 3. $T_{\text{clone}}: \mathcal{P}(\Omega) \to \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ is the mean-field cloning operator with:
2328:    - Generator: $S[\rho] = S_{\text{src}}[\rho] - S_{\text{sink}}[\rho]$
2329:    - Post-cloning noise variance: $\delta^2$
2330:    - Cloning probability: $P_{\text{clone}}(V_i, V_j) = \min(1, V_j/V_i) \cdot \lambda_{\text{clone}}$
2331: 
2332: 4. **Fitness-QSD Anti-Correlation**:
2333:    $$\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$$
2334:    for $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$
2335: 
2336: 5. **Regularity bounds**:
2337:    - $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho_\mu(z) \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$
2338:    - $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
2339: 
2340: **Conclusion (Conjectured):**
2341: 
2342: For $\mu' = T_{\text{clone}} \# \mu$ with infinitesimal time step $\tau$:
2343: 
2344: $$
2345: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) - D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) \leq -\tau \beta \, D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(\tau^2)
2346: $$
2347:

2312: ## Lemma Statement
2313: 
2314: :::{prf:lemma} Entropy Dissipation Under Cloning (Mean-Field Sketch)
2315: :label: lem-mean-field-cloning-sketch
2316: 
2317: **Hypotheses:**
2318: 
2319: 1. $\mu, \pi$ are probability measures on $\Omega = X_{\text{valid}} \times V_{\text{alg}} \subset \mathbb{R}^{2d}$ with smooth densities:
2320:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi \in C^2(\Omega)$
2321:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi > 0$ on $\Omega$ (strictly positive)
2322: 
2323: 2. $\pi = \pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave (Axiom 3.5):
2324:    $$\rho_\pi(z) = \exp(-V_{\text{QSD}}(z))$$
2325:    for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
2326: 
2327: 3. $T_{\text{clone}}: \mathcal{P}(\Omega) \to \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ is the mean-field cloning operator with:
2328:    - Generator: $S[\rho] = S_{\text{src}}[\rho] - S_{\text{sink}}[\rho]$
2329:    - Post-cloning noise variance: $\delta^2$
2330:    - Cloning probability: $P_{\text{clone}}(V_i, V_j) = \min(1, V_j/V_i) \cdot \lambda_{\text{clone}}$
2331: 
2332: 4. **Fitness-QSD Anti-Correlation**:
2333:    $$\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$$
2334:    for $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$
2335: 
2336: 5. **Regularity bounds**:
2337:    - $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho_\mu(z) \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$
2338:    - $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
2339: 
2340: **Conclusion (Conjectured):**
2341: 
2342: For $\mu' = T_{\text{clone}} \# \mu$ with infinitesimal time step $\tau$:
2343: 
2344: $$
2345: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) - D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) \leq -\tau \beta \, D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(\tau^2)
2346: $$
2347: 
2348: where $\beta > 0$ (contraction rate) and $C_{\text{ent}} < 0$ (favorable entropy term) depend on the parameters.
